name: Slide Puzzle Wear - Watch Game
description:
The game transforms a series of images with specific patterns into a random 4x4 puzzle. The algorithm ensures that each generated puzzle has a solution.

It's a difficult game to solve, but simple to play, just touch the cells near the hidden cell to slide and try to form the image.

For now, 12 images available to play. No random images have been chosen, the images have been selected specifically for this game, after a strong filter, ensuring the difference between the different pieces in which the image is divided.
